desc.cn: Elasticsearch 是一个分布式、RESTful 风格的搜索和数据分析引擎，同时是可扩展的数据存储和矢量数据库，能够应对日益增多的各种用例
desc.en: Elasticsearch is a distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine, scalable data store, and vector database capable of addressing a growing number of use cases

debian/apt.cmd:
sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https && \
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg] https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/8.x/apt stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/elastic-8.x.list && \
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install elasticsearch

ubuntu/apt.cmd:
sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https && \
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/elasticsearch-keyring.gpg] https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/8.x/apt stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/elastic-8.x.list && \
sudo apt-get update && \
sudo apt-get install elasticsearch

debian/wget.cmd:
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb && \
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb.sha512 && \
shasum -a 512 -c elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb.sha512 && \
sudo dpkg -i elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb

ubuntu/wget.cmd:
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb && \
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb.sha512 && \
shasum -a 512 -c elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb.sha512 && \
sudo dpkg -i elasticsearch-8.15.0-amd64.deb

centos/yum.cmd:
[elasticsearch] && \
name=Elasticsearch repository for 8.x packages && \
baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/8.x/yum && \
gpgcheck=1 && \
gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch && \
enabled=0 && \
autorefresh=1 && \
type=rpm-md && \
sudo yum install --enablerepo=elasticsearch elasticsearch

rocky/dnf.cmd:
[elasticsearch] && \
name=Elasticsearch repository for 8.x packages && \

opensuse/zypper.cmd:
[elasticsearch] && \
name=Elasticsearch repository for 8.x packages && \
baseurl=https://artifacts.elastic.co/packages/8.x/yum && \
gpgcheck=1 && \
gpgkey=https://artifacts.elastic.co/GPG-KEY-elasticsearch && \
enabled=0 && \
autorefresh=1 && \
type=rpm-md && \
sudo zypper modifyrepo --enable elasticsearch && \
sudo zypper install elasticsearch && \
sudo zypper modifyrepo --disable elasticsearch

rhel/wget.cmd:
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-x86_64.rpm && \
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-x86_64.rpm.sha512 && \
shasum -a 512 -c elasticsearch-8.15.0-x86_64.rpm.sha512 && \
sudo rpm --install elasticsearch-8.15.0-x86_64.rpm

darwin/curl.cmd:
curl -O https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-darwin-x86_64.tar.gz && \
curl https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-8.15.0-darwin-x86_64.tar.gz.sha512 | shasum -a 512 -c - && \
tar -xzf elasticsearch-8.15.0-darwin-x86_64.tar.gz && \
cd elasticsearch-8.15.0/ && \
